name: Skunk Punk
flavour: Smelly Zombie is the only zombie who really gets him, you know?

name: Pied Piper
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Plants here get {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}.
flavour: He was told that playing the pipe would summon raccoons. But whatevs.

name: Zookeeper
abilities: When you play a {{Pet:t:pet include:token}}, all {{Pets:t:pet type:f include:token}} get {{+1Strength}}.
flavour: Snaaaaake!

name: Dolphin Rider
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: The dolphin is also a Zombie.

name: Locust Swarm
abilities: Destroy a Plant.
flavour: A plague upon your lawns!

name: Dog Walker
abilities: Hunt
flavour: Is the Zombie walking the dog, or is the dog walking the Zombie? Hard to say.

name: Nibble
abilities: A Plant gets {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}. If this destroys that Plant, Conjure a {{Gourmet:t:gourmet}} card.
flavour: Just a quick bite.

name: Snorkel Zombie
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: Breathing out: check. Breathing in? Not so much.

name: Yeti Lunchbox
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}. If it is a {{Pet:t:pet type:f include:token}}, it gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+1Health}} instead.
flavour: What's inside? A peanut butter and brains sandwich... with the crusts cut off.

name: Haunting Zombie
abilities: When destroyed: Gain a {{Haunting Ghost:Haunting Ghost}}.
flavour: He doesn't realize he would look even scarier without the spooky ghost costume...

name: Loudmouth
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: A Zombie gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: What he lacks in size, he makes up for in volume.

name: B-flat
abilities: Destroy a random Plant.
flavour: Just wait until you C-Sharp.

name: Total Eclipse
abilities: Plants here get {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}.
flavour: Zombies love a good eclipse. They usually celebrate by eating Plants. And brains.

name: Alien Ooze
abilities:
A Plant gets {{-3Strength}}/{{-3Health}}.
If it's on Heights or an Environment, it gets {{-6Strength}}/{{-6Health}} instead.
flavour: Oozin' for a bruisin!

name: Surfer Zombie
abilities: Amphibious, {{Frenzy}}Frenzy
flavour: He used to hang 10 with the best of them, but ever since he lost that toe to a shark he hasn't been able to hang more than 9.

name: Haunting Ghost
abilities: Amphibious When played: A Plant gets {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}.
flavour: Is he a zombie? Is he a ghost? He refuses to be pigeonholed.

name: Goat
abilities: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} when any kind of {{Goat:goat}} is hurt.
flavour: Hungry... Smelly... A lot like a Zombie but with 100% more goat.

name: Vengeful Cyborg
abilities: Hunt
flavour: His toupee went missing in the heat of battle and he's been furious about it ever since.

name: Squirrel Herder
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Destroy one of their {{Nuts:t:nut -type:t}} or {{Berries:t:berry -type:t}}.
flavour: The only thing more difficult than herding cats.

name: Vimpire
abilities: {{Frenzy}}Frenzy This gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}} when it destroys a Plant.
flavour: He vants to suck your chlorophyll.

name: Vitamin Z
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+3Strength}}/{{+3Health}}.
flavour: Side effects include headaches, blurred vision, and insatiable hunger.

name: Kangaroo Rider
abilities: When hurt: Bounce this Kangaroo.
flavour: Sure, it's a bumpy ride, but it beats walking. Have you seen an Imp's legs?

name: Smashing Gargantuar
abilities: All {{Gargantuars:t:gargantuar type:t}} have {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: When he phones home, it means something completely different.

name: Biodome Botanist
abilities: When played: Make a {{1Strength}}/{{1Health}} {{Plant:is:plant s:1 h:1 -a:a -a:e -a:i -a:o -a:u -a:y}} with no abilities.
flavour: Growing Plants in Space? Some of his fellow Zombies think he's crazy, but others appreciate the effort.

name: Cosmic Yeti
abilities: When played: Conjure a {{Pet:t:pet include:token}}, and it gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}. End of turn: Bounce this Yeti.
flavour: He's hoping they name a constellation after him. "The Big Yeti" does have a ring to it.

name: Primordial Cheese Shover
abilities: Zombie Evolution: Destroy a Plant.
flavour: He's wheely cheesy.

name: Killer Whale
abilities: Amphibious Fusion: A Zombie played on this gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and Amphibious.
flavour: Flooding Hollow Earth with water from above, Neptuna attacked with flying whale cavalry. Or really, falling whale cavalry.

name: Cat Lady
abilities: This gets {{+3Strength}} this turn when you play a {{Pet:t:pet include:token}}.
flavour: The cat on the left is a Z-Tube celebrity.

name: Zombie Yeti
abilities: When played: Gain a {{Yeti Lunchbox:Yeti Lunchbox}}. End of Turn: Bounce this Yeti.
flavour: Enjoys warm hugs.

name: Deep Sea Gargantuar
abilities: Amphibious, Hunt When any Zombie enters any lane, that Zombie gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Has every single issue of Deep Sea Quarterly, but rarely has time to read them.

name: Maniacal Laugh
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+5Strength}}/{{+5Health}} and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: It's not so much "hahaha" as it is "mwahahaha."

name: Cheese Cutter
abilities: When this hurts the Plant Hero: Conjure a {{Gourmet:t:gourmet}} card, and it costs {{1Brain}} less.
flavour: Is that the exquisite scent of an aged Camembert, or just rotting flesh?

name: Cyborg Zombie
abilities: Hunt When destroyed: Gain a {{Vengeful Cyborg:Vengeful Cyborg}}.
flavour: He'll be back.

name: Area 22
abilities: Zombies here get {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}} and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: "Zombies from outer space? What an absurd conspiracy theory! Now move along. Nothing to see here." - Dr. Zomboss

name: Ancient Vimpire
abilities: Amphibious {{Frenzy}}Frenzy When any Zombie with {{Frenzy}}Frenzy destroys a Plant, that Zombie gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: Vimpirism - an ancient curse evolved from the dawn of time.

name: Extinction Event
abilities: A Plant gets {{-2Strength}}/{{-2Health}}. All other copies of that Plant also get {{-2Strength}}/{{-2Health}}.
flavour: Sometimes the evolutionary tree withers at the root.

name: Hunting Grounds
abilities: Zombies here have Hunt. When a Zombie enters or leaves this lane, it gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Are the Zombies hunting dinosaurs, or are the dinosaurs hunting them?

name: Nurse Gargantuar
abilities: When a {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar (type:f or Zombot's Wrath)}} does damage, heal your Hero that much.
flavour: Their bedside manner could use some work.

name: Octo Zombie
abilities: Amphibious {{Frenzy}}Frenzy When played: Make a {{3Strength}}/{{2Health}} {{Octo-Pet:Octo-Pet include:token}} with Amphibious and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy. When destroyed: Gain an {{Octo Zombie:Octo Zombie}}.
flavour: Is the correct term 'octopuses' or 'octopi'? You'd think he'd have an opinion, but he doesn't.

name: Zombot 1000
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Destroy all Plants here and next door.
flavour: The first 999 Zombots are now considered classics.

name: Interstellar Bounty Hunter
abilities: Hunt, {{Frenzy}}Frenzy When this destroys a Plant, draw a card.
flavour: If you have a bounty on your head, she won't stop until she eats your brains. It's not personal. It's just business.

name: Supernova Gargantuar
abilities: {{Frenzy}}Frenzy When a {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar (type:f or Zombot's Wrath)}} destroys a Plant, destroy all copies of that Plant.
flavour: This one's got a real temper on him. When he decides to take out a Plant...it's brutal. Just brutal.

name: Mondo Bronto
abilities: Amphibious Dino-Roar: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and destroy all Plants here.
flavour: Deep in Hollow Earth, Zombie warrior women tame herds of enormous dinosaurs. Any good history book will tell you that.

name: Gargantuar-Throwing Gargantuar
abilities: When hurt: Make another random {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar type:f}} in a random lane.
flavour: The ultimate, epic, last, absolutely final conclusion to the Zombie-throwing Zombie saga. ...or is it?

name: Fraidy Cat
abilities: When a Plant Trick is played, this gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and moves to a random lane.
flavour: What's a black cat's favorite color? Purrrrr-ple.

name: Secret Agent
abilities: Bounce a Zombie, and it gets {{+3Strength}}/{{+3Health}}.
flavour: He likes his brains shaken, not stirred.

name: Energy Drink Zombie
abilities: {{Frenzy}}Frenzy Start of Tricks: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and moves to a random lane.
flavour: He can quit any time he wants.

name: Synchronized Swimmer
abilities: Amphibious When played: This Zombie copies the {{Strength}} and {{Heart}} of another Zombie.
flavour: It takes a lot of practice for two Zombies' heads to fall off at the exact same time.

name: Hover-Goat 3000
abilities: Amphibious. When played: Another Zombie gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}. When hurt: Bounce this Goat.
flavour: The future is Hovering. The future is Radical. The future is Goat.

name: Overstuffed Zombie
abilities: Hunt. When this destroys a Plant and survives, it heals to full and heals your Hero 2.
flavour: His cholesterol level is off the charts, and yet he seems to be in remarkably good Health.

name: Sneezing Zombie
abilities: Plants and the Plant Hero can't be healed. When played: All Plants get {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}.
flavour: Flowers give her awful allergies and sickening sneezes. Is that why she wears one on her head?

name: King of the Grill
abilities: {{Frenzy}}Frenzy When a {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar (type:f or Zombot's Wrath)}} destroys a Plant, Conjure a {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar}} card.
flavour: Chillin' beside the ol' backyard grill, cookin' up some brains, hangin' with his zombies... that's the good unlife.

name: Zom-Bats
abilities: Amphibious When this hurts a Plant, draw a card.
flavour: Like Chihuahuas with wings... and fangs... and a taste for Plants.

name: Acid Rain
abilities: All Plants on the Ground get {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}.
flavour: Strong enough to destroy a Plant, but pH-balanced for a Zombie.

name: Evaporate
abilities:
Destroy a damaged Plant.
Draw a card.
flavour: Did you know that Plants are 62 percent water? Well, not any more.

name: Galvanize
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: To protect and serve... brains.

name: Cardboard Robot Zombie
flavour: He's Rustbolt's biggest fan.

name: Paparazzi Zombie
abilities: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} when you play a Trick.
flavour: Why is everyone always screaming and running away in his photos?

name: Lurch for Lunch
abilities: A Zombie does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: Will work overtime for food.

name: Fun-Dead Raiser
abilities: Draw two cards.
flavour: Pledge now and get two Zombies plus a free tote bag.

name: Drum Major
flavour: Recently promoted from Drum Minor.

name: Chimney Sweep
abilities: When played on Heights: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: It's a growth industry.

name: Beam Me Up
abilities: Make a {{2Strength}}/{{3Health}} {{Space Cadet:Space Cadet include:token}} Zombie.
flavour: A sure way to get Space Cadet's attention.

name: Cell Phone Zombie
abilities: When played: Draw a card.
flavour: Hang on - he's got to take this.

name: Pool Shark
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye
flavour: Not actually a shark.

name: Zombot Drone Engineer
abilities: Gravestone When a {{Science:t:science type:f include:token}} Zombie does damage, that Zombie gets {{+1Strength}}.
flavour: He's not entirely sure how to fly this thing.

name: Brain Vendor
abilities: When played: You get {{+3Brain}} this turn.
flavour: Sells only 100% organic brains.

name: Mountain Climber
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When played on Heights: This gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: She's climbed 'em all: Everest. K2. Your house.

name: Cryo-Brain
abilities: You get {{+1Brain}} for the rest of the game.
flavour: Putting brains on ice is the best way to keep them fresh. Ask any Zombie.

name: Medulla Nebula
abilities: When you play a Zombie here, you get {{+2Brain}} this turn.
flavour: Zombies often find brains in space. It's usually the space between your ears.

name: Moonwalker
abilities: When played on Heights or an Environment: This gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: That's one small nibble for Zombies, one giant bite for Zombiekind.

name: Copter Commando
flavour: Refuses to fly over water due to a severe case of aquaphobia.

name: Mustache Waxer
abilities: When you play a {{Mustache:t:mustache}}, this gets {{+2Health}} and you get {{+1Brain}}.
flavour: Customers have been telling him "Get a brain" for years now.

name: Quarterly Bonus
abilities: Strength of a Zombie becomes 4, then it does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: Zombie Pirates kick a lot of booty. Maybe someday they'll figure how to spend it.

name: Gentleman Zombie
abilities: Gravestone Start of Tricks: You get {{+2Brain}} this turn.
flavour: Life comes and goes, but proper manners are forever.

name: Kite Flyer
abilities: Gravestone When this does damage, draw a card.
flavour: The naysayers were right. Flying a kite in a lightning storm WAS a real bright idea.

name: Gadget Scientist
abilities: When played: Each {{Science:t:science type:f include:token}} Zombie does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: Wishes the Mad Chemist would stop copying his hair style.

name: Hail-a-Copter
abilities: Make a {{6Strength}}/{{5Health}} {{Copter Commando:Copter Commando}} Imp.
flavour: Refuses to fly over water due to a severe case of aquaphobia.

name: Wizard Gargantuar
abilities: All {{Gargantuars:t:gargantuar (type:f or Zombot's Wrath)}} have {{Truestrike}}Bullseye. When played: Transform another Zombie into a random Zombie that costs {{1Brain}} more.
flavour: A wizard did it. An enormous, green, Zombie wizard.

name: Cosmic Scientist
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When played: Conjure a {{Science:t:science include:token}} card, and it gets {{Truestrike}}Bullseye.
flavour: He has no idea what's in the beakers. He just likes to mix them together until they go BOOM!

name: Triplication
abilities: Conjure an {{Imp:t:imp include:token}}, a {{Zombie:is:zombie type:f}}, and a {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar}}.
flavour: An Imp, a Zombie, and Gargantuar walk into a bar...

name: Zom-Blob
abilities: Zombie Evolution: This gets {{+1Strength}} for each Brain you got this turn.
flavour: This is why you shouldn't drink primordial soup.

name: Mustache Monument
abilities: Fusion: A Zombie played on this does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: If Neptuna's Triassic Invasion force can align all of Hollow Earth's Mustache Monuments at once, she will become truly unstoppable.

name: Electrician
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: A Zombie does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: He charges for the full hour.

name: Rocket Science
abilities: Destroy a Plant that has {{4Strength}} or more.
flavour: Turns out, it IS rocket science.

name: Mad Chemist
abilities: Gravestone When you play your first {{Trick:is:zombie type:t}} each turn, Conjure a {{Trick:is:zombie type:t}}, and it costs {{1Brain}} less.
flavour: He's not so much "mad" as he is "mildly annoyed."

name: Portal Technician
abilities: When destroyed: Make a random Zombie here.
flavour: Soon everyone will own their own portal. But for now, he enjoys being an early adopter.

name: Neutron Imp
abilities: When an {{Environment:type:e include:s}} is played, this does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: He's not small, he's just very compact.

name: Transformation Station
abilities: Start of turn: Transform the Zombie here into a random Zombie that costs {{1Brain}} more.
flavour: According to the Transformation Station brochure, every Zombie who visits is guaranteed to shuffle away feeling like a brand new Zombie.

name: Wormhole Gatekeeper
abilities: Cards either player Conjures cost 1 less. Start of turn: Each player Conjures a card.
flavour: "Stand here and guard this gate with your unlife," she was told. And that's what she's been doing ever since.

name: Evolutionary Leap
abilities:
Transform a Zombie into a random Zombie that costs {{1Brain}} more.
Draw a card.
flavour: When Dr. Zomboss sent Meteor Z and Huge-Gigantacus from space, they smashed a tunnel to the center of the Earth. There, Plants and Zombies had evolved into insane new forms.

name: Parasol Zombie
abilities: {{Untrickable}}Untrickable Zombies next door are {{Untrickable}}Untrickable.
flavour: Her favorite author is Brain Austen.

name: Duckstache
abilities: When this does damage, Conjure a {{Mustache:t:mustache}}. Mustache Evolution: This gets {{+3Strength}}/{{+3Health}}.
flavour: Determined to find every Mustache Monument in Hollow Earth, Neptuna brought in the experts.

name: Teleport
abilities:
You may play a Zombie when it's time for Tricks this turn.
Draw a card.
flavour: Feels like cheating.

name: Shieldcrusher Viking
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When played and When this hurts the Plant Hero, empty their Block Meter.
flavour: Been crushing shields since the 9th Century. Has gotten pretty darn good at it.

name: Trickster
abilities: While in your hand: This costs {{1Brain}} less when you play a {{Trick:type:t is:zombie}}. When played: This does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: Never gets tired of the rubber chicken gag.

name: Interdimensional Zombie
abilities: When you play a {{Science:t:science}} card, this transforms into a random {{Zombie:is:zombie c:3 type:f include:token}} that costs {{3Brain}}.
flavour: In a parallel dimension, this zombie is a Space Pirate. In another he's a Trash Can Zombie. Turns out, little choices in life can make a big difference.

name: Teleportation Zombie
abilities: Gravestone, {{Truestrike}}Bullseye You can play Zombies when it's time for Tricks.
flavour: The phone cord stretches to another dimension.

name: Gargantuar Mime
abilities: When a non-{{Mime:t:mime}} Plant or Zombie does a Bonus Attack, this does a Bonus Attack.
flavour: The Gargantuar Mime groans like any other zombie. He just does it silently, and in French.

name: Zombot Dinotronic Mechasaur
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye Dino-Roar: Make a random {{History:t:history type:f}} Zombie in a random lane.
flavour: What's better than a dinosaur? A gigantic, metal, laser monster that gates in four more dinosaurs.

name: Leprechaun Imp
abilities: When played: Shuffle a {{Pot of Gold:Pot of Gold include:token}} into your deck.
flavour: When he offers to grant you a wish, do not wish for infinite wishes. It just doesn't work like that.

name: Regifting Zombie
abilities: When played: Conjure a {{Zombie:type:f is:zombie}}, and it gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}. The Plant player Conjures a {{Plant:is:plant type:f}}, and that Plant gets {{-1Strength}}/{{-1Health}}.
flavour: Regifting: Is it really an embarrassing social faux pas? Or is it just good ol' recycling?

name: Trick-or-Treater
abilities: Gravestone When you play your first {{Trick:is:zombie type:t}} each turn, Conjure a {{Treat:Treat type:t}}.
flavour: Trick or Treat? He is haunted by that question - and by an answer that continues to elude him.

name: Thinking Cap
abilities: Conjure two {{Superpowers:is:zombie t:superpower include:superpower}}.
flavour: Only the best and the brainiest University Zombies graduate to using full-fledged Superpowers.

name: Kitchen Sink Zombie
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye, {{Frenzy}}Frenzy, {{Armored}}Armored 1, {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 2, {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 3
flavour: He's got everything but the - no wait, he's got that too.

name: Bad Moon Rising
abilities: Transform every Zombie into random {{Zombies:is:zombie c>=5}} that costs {{5Brain}} or more.
flavour: Sometimes a full moon turns bad dreams into horrible nightmares.

name: Pot of Gold
abilities: Draw three cards.
flavour: The luck of the Zombies!

name: Space Cadet
flavour: His body is in space, but his head is in the clouds.

name: Zom-Bats
abilities: Amphibious When this hurts a Plant, draw a Card.
flavour: Like Chihuahuas with wings... and fangs... and a taste for Plants.

name: Cut Down to Size
abilities: Destroy a Plant that has {{5Strength}} or more.
flavour: "The tallest blade of grass is the first to get cut. Braaainz!" - Ancient Zombie Proverb

name: Summoning
abilities: Make a random {{Zombie:is:zombie type:f c<=2}} that costs {{2Brain}} or less.
flavour: It's like a blind date... but with Zombies... and fighting.

name: Telepathy
abilities: Draw two cards.
flavour: You're thinking of a number between 1 and braaaaains.

name: Iron Boarder
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye While in an Environment: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Working for a Huge-Gigantacus isn't the worst job he's ever had. It comes with a 401Z plan, which is more than what most Zombie employers offer.

name: Teleportation Station
abilities: Start of turn: If there's a Zombie here, gain a {{Teleport:Teleport type:t}}.
flavour: Teleportation is a relatively new technology. Has a few kinks that need ironing out. So yeah, sometimes things get a little...mixed up.

name: Backup Dancer
flavour: Spent six years perfecting his art at the Chewliard School for the Performing Arts.

name: Bungee Plumber
abilities: Do 2 damage.
flavour: Likes: Plumbing and adventure sports. Dislikes: Belts.

name: Cuckoo Zombie
flavour: He always knows what time it is. CRAZY TIME!

name: Disco Zombie
abilities: When played: Make a {{1Strength}}/{{1Health}} {{Backup Dancer:Backup Dancer}}.
flavour: Disco is undead.

name: Flamenco Zombie
abilities: When played: Do 2 damage to the Plant Hero for each {{Dancing:t:dancing type:f}} Zombie.
flavour: Also enjoys dancing the rumba, tango, and the Hokey Pokey.

name: Tennis Champ
abilities: When played: This gets {{+3Strength}} this turn.
flavour: When it's Plants vs. Zombies, the score is never love-love.

name: Unlife of the Party
abilities: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} when you play a Zombie.
flavour: His archenemy is the Wall-Flower.

name: Conga Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Do 1 damage.
flavour: Important Note: The fruit on her hat is made of plastic.

name: Newspaper Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When hurt: This gets {{+4Strength}}.
flavour: Newspapers are an undead medium.

name: Cakesplosion
abilities: Do 4 damage to a Plant.
flavour: 4 eggs. 2 cups flour. 10 sticks TNT.

name: Orchestra Conductor
abilities: When played: All Zombies get {{+2Strength}}.
flavour: He isn't in it for the music. He just likes waving sticks.

name: Foot Soldier Zombie
abilities: When played on Heights: Do 3 damage.
flavour: Each Foot Soldier Zombie shall be issued one (1) combat foot.

name: Loose Cannon
abilities: {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 2
flavour: His friends keep telling him it's too dangerous, but he never listens. He's having a blast.

name: Meteor Z
abilities: Zombies here have {{+2Strength}}.
flavour: Huge-Gigantacus drove Meteor Z deep into the Earth, creating a tunnel to a hidden world of strange creatures...but what's down there???

name: Space Ninja
abilities: While in an Environment: The first time each turn this does damage, do 1 damage to each Plant.
flavour: You will never hear him coming in the vacuum of space.

name: Mystery Egg
abilities: Start of Tricks: Transform this into a random {{zombie:is:zombie type:f c<=2 include:token}} that costs {{2Brain}} or less.
flavour: "Mommy, where do little Zombies come from?" Asked and answered.

name: Sugary Treat
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+3Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Tooth decay: Not exactly a big concern for Zombies.

name: Trapper Territory
abilities: Before combat here: Do 1 damage to each Plant here.
flavour: Plants do not like feeling trapped. Can you blame them?

name: Exploding Imp
abilities: Gravestone End of Turn: This does 1 damage to itself.
flavour: You could say he's an IMPlosives expert.

name: Jester
abilities: Gravestone When hurt: Do 2 damage to the Plant Hero.
flavour: The joke's on you!

name: Zombot's Wrath
abilities: Do damage equal to the number of Zombies.
flavour: Dr. Zomboss believes that there's no problem that can't be solved by a giant robot.

name: The Chickening
abilities: Do 2 damage to each Plant.
flavour: So. Many. Feathers.

name: Imp-Throwing Gargantuar
abilities: When hurt: Make a {{1Strength}}/{{1Health}}{{Swabbie:Swabbie}} with Amphibious in a random lane.
flavour: Seems like a better idea than a Gargantuar-Throwing Imp.

name: Final Mission
abilities: Destroy a Zombie. Then do 4 damage to a Plant.
flavour: The round-trip ticket is the same price as the one-way.

name: Cosmic Dancer
abilities: {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 2 When played: Conjure a {{Dancing:t:dancing}} card, and it gets {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 2.
flavour: Across the cosmos, the passion for dance is the only universal language.

name: Gizzard Lizard
abilities: Zombie Evolution: Do 3 damage to each Plant.
flavour: He's the missing skink.

name: Disco Dance Floor
abilities: {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 2 Fusion: a Zombie played on this gets {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 2.
flavour: The Triassic Invasion brought the very best of Zombie culture: Disco.

name: Aerobics Instructor
abilities: Start of Turn: All {{Dancing:t:dancing type:f}} Zombies get {{+2Strength}}.
flavour: Aerobics really bring the dead to life.

name: Abracadaver
abilities: Gravestone When this hurts the Plant Hero, do 3 damage to a random Plant.
flavour: Keeps forgetting that the magic word is "Please."

name: Fireworks Zombie
abilities: When played: Do 1 damage to all Plants and Zombies.
flavour: Want to clear some mushrooms? Fire works.

name: Disco-Tron 3000
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Make a {{3Strength}}/{{1Health}} {{Disco Zombie:Disco Zombie}} that makes a {{1Strength}}/{{1Health}} {{Backup Dancer:Backup Dancer}}.
flavour: A fully weaponized jukebox.

name: Disco-Naut
abilities: Zombies with {{2Strength}} or less have {{Truestrike}}Bullseye.
flavour: Nothing focuses your aim like the super-sick wailing of a space keytar solo.

name: Moon Base Z
abilities: Zombies here get {{Overshoot}}Overshoot 3.
flavour: Zombies landed on the Moon? Many believe it's nothing but a conspiracy theory, and yet, here's the proof.

name: Gas Giant
abilities: When hurt: Do 1 damage to each other Plant and Zombie. When destroyed: Do 5 damage to the Plant Hero.
flavour: There isn't a fart joke he hasn't heard.

name: Quickdraw Con Man
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye When the Plant Hero draws a card, do 1 damage to them.
flavour: How did he know the Plants were coming? Because four-armed is forewarned.

name: Grave Robber
abilities: {{Truestrike}}Bullseye This gets {{+1Strength}} when a Zombie is revealed from a Gravestone.
flavour: Why not rob graves? They're not going to miss it. It's not like the dead are rising up or anything.

name: Zombie's Best Friend
abilities: When played next to a Zombie: Make another random {{Zombie:is:zombie c=1 type:f}} that costs {{1Brain}}.
flavour: "What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight; it's the size of the fight in the dog." - Wight Z. Diesenhower

name: Barrel of Deadbeards
abilities: When destroyed: Do 1 damage to all Plants and Zombies, then make a {{4Strength}}/{{3Health}} {{Captain Deadbeard:Captain Deadbeard include:token}} here.
flavour: No monkeys, just Zombies.

name: Valkyrie
abilities: While in your hand: This gets {{+2Strength}} when a Zombie is destroyed.
flavour: It's not easy hitting those high notes when all you can sing is, "Braaaaains."

name: Gargantuars' Feast
abilities: Make 3 random {{Gargantuars:t:gargantuar type:f}} in random Lanes.
flavour: This party doesn't make reservations.

name: Quasar Wizard
abilities: When played next to a Zombie: Conjure a {{Superpower:is:zombie t:superpower include:superpower}}.
flavour: You can call him Quazard for short.

name: Binary Stars
abilities: Gravestone All your cards do double damage.
flavour: He's a Gemini and so is she. Which explains so much, right?

name: Tankylosaurus
abilities: Dino-Roar: Do 2 damage to a random Plant or Plant Hero.
flavour: When not exploring Hollow Earth's jungles, they like to go clubbing.

name: Bobblehead
abilities: When you play a {{Dancing:t:dancing}} card, do 2 damage to the Plant Hero. Dancing Evolution: This gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}} and {{Truestrike}}Bullseye.
flavour: He offers a special deal: Two of his heads for one of yours. Anyway you slice it, you still come out a head.

name: Exploding Fruitcake
abilities: Do 5 damage to a Plant. The Plant player Conjures a {{Fruit:t:fruit}}.
flavour: Once you get past all the dynamite and bombs, fruitcakes actually contain at least 5% Fruit.

name: Unexpected Gifts
abilities: Conjure three {{Event:r:e is:zombie}} cards. Then the Plant player Conjures an {{Event:r:e is:plant}} card.
flavour: "For the 4th day of Feastivus, my true love gave to me: 1 Fire Rooster, 1 Sneezing Zombie, 1 Bad Moon Rising, and a partridge in a Pear Tree!"

name: Stupid Cupid
abilities: When played: Do 1 damage to a Plant. That Plant has {{0Strength}} this turn.
flavour: What's love got to do with it? Honestly, he has no idea.

name: Frankentuar
abilities: Splash Damage 2 This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} when a Zombie is destroyed.
flavour: IT'S ALIVE! IT'S ALI-I-I-IVE! Ok, strictly speaking, it's not alive.

name: Gargantuar-Throwing Imp
abilities: When hurt: Make a random {{Gargantuar:t:gargantuar c:5 type:f}} that costs {{5Brain}} in a random lane.
flavour: When lifting a Gargantuar, always bend at the knees. He learned this the hard way.

name: Hippity Hop Gargantuar
abilities: When played and When hurt: Make a {{Mystery Egg:Mystery Egg}} in a random lane.
flavour: Sometimes, what has been seen... can't be unseen. This is one of those times.

name: Impfinity Clone
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: An IMPerfect copy, but it'll do.

name: Captain Deadbeard
flavour: Yo ho ho! It's a pirate's unlife for him!

name: Brute Strength
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+3Strength}}.
flavour: Is there any other kind?

name: Dance Off
abilities: Make a {{1Strength}}/{{1Health}} {{Backup Dancer:Backup Dancer}} in a lane of your choice. Then another appears in a random lane.
flavour: You put your right foot in! No, wait, you might need that.

name: Electrobolt
abilities: Do 3 damage to a Plant.
flavour: Ever get zapped by static electricity? It's like that, times a bazillion.

name: Baseball Zombie
flavour: Home run. Running for your home. It's all the same to him.

name: Rolling Stone
abilities: Destroy a Plant with {{2Strength}} or less.
flavour: Gives new meaning to the phrase "rock n' roll".

name: Conehead
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1
flavour: Almost went out with a lampshade on his head. Thought better of it.

name: Team Mascot
abilities: Start of Turn: All {{Sports:t:sport type:f}} Zombies get {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Say what you will about the costume - Zombie morale has never been better.

name: Medic
abilities: When played: Heal 4.
flavour: It's hard keeping Zombies on their feet. It's harder keeping feet on the Zombies.

name: Arm Wrestler
abilities: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} when a Plant enters this lane.
flavour: Lots of carbs, lots of protein, and five brain shakes a day.

name: Camel Crossing
abilities: All Zombies get {{+2Health}}.
flavour: Camels - they're filthy, ill-tempered animals that'll spit on you just for fun. But Zombies love 'em all the same.

name: Flag Zombie
abilities: Zombies cost {{1Brain}} less.
flavour: He's not patriotic; he just likes fabric suspended from sticks.

name: Terrify
abilities: Move a Plant. Conjure a {{Monster:t:monster}}.
flavour: Just a disembodied Zombie head screaming uncontrollably. Nope. Nothing terrifying about that.

name: Trash Can Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: This can't be hurt this turn.
flavour: It's dark and quiet in there. He finds it soothing. That's what no one gets.

name: Buckethead
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1
flavour: Why a bucket? Well, gosh, in this economy, why NOT?

name: Ra Zombie
abilities: When played: The Plant Hero loses {{2Sun}} this turn.
flavour: Some nights sundown comes early...

name: Cone Zone
abilities: Zombies here get {{+3Health}}.
flavour: You are about to enter another dimension. A dimension not only of sight and sound, but of cones.

name: Celestial Custodian
abilities: When played in an Environment: Destroy a Plant with {{3Strength}} or less.
flavour: Don't call him a "Space Janitor." He's a "Celestial Custodian" and darn proud of it.

name: Screen Door Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: This can't be hurt this turn.
flavour: Little known fact: He carries a door to protect himself from solar radiation.

name: Healthy Treat
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+3Health}}.
flavour: Great for Zombie Health. Like a vitamin only sweeter.

name: Zombie Middle Manager
abilities: This gets {{+1Strength}} when another {{Professional:t:professional type:f}} gets hurt. When played: Conjure a {{Professional:t:professional}}.
flavour: Like most managers, bringing pain to his employees gives him strength.

name: Leftovers
abilities: All Zombies get {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Zombies love them almost as much as brains.

name: Sumo Wrestler
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Move a Plant.
flavour: Hey, he's in shape. Round is a shape.

name: Zombie Coach
abilities: When played: All {{Sports:t:sports type:f}} Zombies can't be hurt this turn.
flavour: There's no "i" in Zombee!

name: Monster Mash
abilities: All Zombies get {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: Zombies never feel more alive than when they're dancing.

name: Knight of the Living Dead
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 2
flavour: He's both secretary and treasurer for the Knights of the Square Table.

name: Rodeo Gargantuar
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Move a Plant.
flavour: Why yes, this IS his first rodeo.

name: Escape through Time
abilities: A Zombie can't be hurt this turn. Conjure a {{History:t:history}} card.
flavour: Possible side effects include: the creation of a temporal paradox, the unraveling of the fabric of reality, erasing your entire existence, a mild foot rash.

name: Cosmic Sports Star
abilities: When played: Conjure a {{Sports:t:sports}} card, and it costs {{2Brain}} less.
flavour: He's been named Most Valuable Zombie of the Galaxy two years in a row!

name: Primeval Yeti
abilities: Zombie Evolution: All Zombies get {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: What's for lunch? Mostly solid stone.

name: Lost Colosseum
abilities: {{Frenzy}}Frenzy Fusion: A Zombie played on this gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+3Health}} and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: The Legend of the Mustache Monuments led Zombie explorers to uncover ancient colosseums.

name: Landscaper
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: A Plant gets {{-2Strength}}.
flavour: If barren rock and wilted Plants are what you want, he's the landscaper for the job.

name: Weed Spray
abilities: Destroy each Plant with {{2Strength}} or less.
flavour: Act now! Rids your lawn of pesky weeds... and Peashooters and Sunflowers. Also Wall-Nuts.

name: All-Star Zombie
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1, {{Frenzy}}Frenzy, {{Untrickable}}Untrickable
flavour: Gives 110% on the field. Has no idea what a football is.

name: Coffee Zombie
abilities: When played: All Zombies get {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: He's been trying to cut back.

name: Planetary Gladiator
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 If your Hero would get hurt, this gets hurt instead.
flavour: He's still not sure if he should defend Pluto or not.

name: Genetic Experiment
abilities: Start of Tricks: This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} if there's a Zombie next door.
flavour: Pickled Zombie is the best kind of Zombie.

name: Black Hole
abilities:
Plants here get {{-1Strength}}.
When a Plant is played, move it here.
flavour: Plants usually like being planted in holes. Black holes? Not so much.

name: Jurassic Fossilhead
abilities: {{Untrickable}}Untrickable Professional Evolution: This gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}}.
flavour: For him, Fossilheading isn't just a hobby. It's a career.

name: Knockout
abilities: Choose a lane. Destroy all Plants there with {{3Strength}} or less.
flavour: No one knows where the giant green hand and the giant purple hand comes from. What will happen when they clap?

name: Turquoise Skull Zombie
abilities: Gravestone Start of turn: The Plant Player loses {{1Sun}}. This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: The mystical Turquoise Skull stole the sun itself, lighting the way to the Mustache Monuments.

name: Zombie King
abilities: End of Turn: Transform another random Zombie into a {{5Strength}}/{{5Health}} {{Knight of the Living Dead:Knight of the Living Dead}} with Armored 2{{Armored}}.
flavour: Contrary to popular opinion, it's just OK to be king.

name: Undying Pharaoh
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 Your Hero's Health can't go below 1.
flavour: If the Plants think they're going to beat the Undying Pharaoh, they're in de-Nile.

name: Wannabe Hero
abilities: {{Frenzy}}Frenzy When played: Heal 3 Then this gets {{+1Health}} for each Health your Hero has.
flavour: He has Super Brainz stickers all over his binder.

name: Intergalactic Warlord
abilities: When played: For the rest of the game, all Zombies get {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: In space Zombie circles, he's a very powerful figure. Just don't talk about him in front of Huge-Gigantacus. There's some jealousy there.

name: Zombot Battlecruiser 5000
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Zombies can't be hurt this turn.
flavour: Not space legal in 35 different galaxies.

name: Stompadon
abilities: Dino-Roar: All Zombies in your hand get {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: With a cerebellum the size of a Wall-Nut, it specializes in oversized bodies for little brains.

name: Chum Champion
abilities: When played: All Plants get {{-1Strength}}. Sports Evolution: Destroy each Plant with {{2Strength}} or less.
flavour: The Retiarius gladiator was classically armed with a trident, a net, and a 10-day-old fish.

name: Zombology Teacher
abilities: Zombie Tricks cost {{1Brain}} less.
flavour: "If you don't pay attention in class, you'll never improve your brains..."

name: Gargologist
abilities: {{Gargantuars:t:gargantuar}} cost {{2Brain}} less.
flavour: After years of studying Gargantuars in the wild, she's dedicated herself to telling the world they're just misunderstood gentle giants. So far, nobody's buying it.

name: Turkey Rider
abilities: When destroyed: Gain a {{Leftovers:Leftovers}}.
flavour: He insists that, as far as modes of transportation go, turkeys outperform dolphins, walruses, and kangaroos any day.

name: Going Viral
abilities: All Zombies get {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy. Shuffle three {{Going Viral:Going Viral}} cards into your deck. Draw a card.
flavour: Though Zombies can't get ill, this plague is totally sick.

name: Bonus Track Buckethead
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 Plants can't do {{Bonus Attacks:is:plant (a:bonus a:attack or a:double a:strike) -"Party Thyme" -"Wing-Nut" i:s}}.
flavour: He put all his favorite songs on that mixtape. If only he could find the right Zombie to give it to.

name: Defensive End
abilities: {{Armored}}Armored 1 Plant Tricks cost {{2Sun}} more.
flavour: Somebody once told him the best defense is a good offence. He disagrees. Da fence he like best is da one he SMASH through.

name: Octo-Pet
abilities: Amphibious {{Frenzy}}Frenzy
flavour: It's slimy, beady-eyed, and it leaves ink splotches wherever it goes. Neptuna loves it all the same.

name: Heroic Health
abilities: Heal your Hero for 6.
flavour: A healthy Hero is a happy Hero.

name: Possessed
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+2Health}} and {{Frenzy}}Frenzy.
flavour: There's nothing like a good possession to perk a Zombie up.

name: Rock Wall
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+5Health}}.
flavour: Better than a wall of scissors, but worse than a wall of paper.

name: Imp
flavour: He's proficient in Zombie judo and Zombie karate. He also plays the Melodica.

name: Mini-Ninja
abilities: {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 2
flavour: His motto: Walk softly and carry a big nunchuck.

name: Smoke Bomb
abilities: Move a Zombie. It gets {{+1Strength}}.
flavour: Good for eluding the enemy. Bad for the lungs

name: Fishy Imp
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: Throws the *best* pool parties.

name: Smelly Zombie
abilities: Gravestone, {{Deadly}}Deadly
flavour: Casual acquaintances don't understand where his pets are. They don't realize that stinkflies can be such tender little friends.

name: Headstone Carver
abilities: When a Zombie is revealed from a Gravestone, that Zombie gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: His epitaphs have been published on headstones around the world.

name: Zombie Chicken
abilities: This moves to a random lane when a Plant is played here.
flavour: Question: Which came first, the Chicken or the egg? Answer: The Zombie!

name: Hot Dog Imp
abilities: {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough
flavour: He was THIS close to wearing the chicken costume, but darn it, Team Mascot Imp called it first.

name: Swashbuckler Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When a {{Pirate:t:pirate type:f include:token}} hurts the Plant Hero, that Pirate gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Buckles his swash like no other.

name: Backyard Bounce
abilities: Bounce a Plant.
flavour: Zombies love trampolines. Not everyone knows that.

name: Stealthy Imp
abilities: Gravestone, {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 4
flavour: Don't look, but there's one behind you right now!

name: Firefighter
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Bounce another Zombie.
flavour: He's a little too eager to rescue kittens from trees.

name: Graveyard
abilities:
Zombies played here are Gravestones.
When a Zombie is revealed from a Gravestone here, it gets {{+1Strength}}.
flavour: Super Brainz always wanted a house with a nice yard.

name: Ice Pirate
abilities: Gravestone When revealed in an Environment: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Plant.
flavour: You wouldn't believe how many brains a chunk of space ice goes for on a black market. Let's just say, she's rolling in gray matter.

name: Frosty Mustache
abilities: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Plant. Conjure a {{Mustache:t:mustache}}.
flavour: So stylish! So cool!

name: Swabbie
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: When he's not fighting Plants, you'll find him swabbing the Zombot Plank Walker's poop deck.

name: Barrel of Barrels
abilities: A Zombie becomes {{Deadly}}Deadly. Conjure a {{Barrel:t:barrel}}.
flavour: If you put a container in another container, you'll have twice the storage space!

name: Monkey Smuggler
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Steal a section from the Plant Hero's Super-Block Meter.
flavour: Piracy is serious monkey business.

name: Imp Commander
abilities: Gravestone When an {{Imp:t:imp type:f include:token}} hurts the Plant Hero, draw a card.
flavour: He's got a bit of a Napoleon Complex. Obviously.

name: Barrel Roller Zombie
abilities: {{Deadly}}Deadly When destroyed: Make {{1Strength}}/{{1Health}} {{Swabbies:Swabbie}} with Amphibious next door.
flavour: The second-most affordable way to transport Imps.

name: Surprise Gargantuar
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Move this Zombie.
flavour: Surprise! It's a brains-eating monster at your party!

name: Walrus Rider
abilities: Amphibious, {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 3
flavour: A walrus seemed the obvious choice. After all, horses don't go on land *and* water.

name: Zombot Stomp
abilities: Bounce all Plants on the Ground.
flavour: Don't make him put his foot down!

name: Space Pirate
abilities: {{Anti-Hero}}Anti-Hero 2 This moves to a random lane when a Plant is played here.
flavour: At first he just dabbled in space piracy, but then he got hooked.

name: Cosmic Imp
abilities: {{Deadly}}Deadly When played: Conjure an {{Imp:t:imp include:token}}, and it gets {{Deadly}}Deadly.
flavour: When he gazes out at the stars, he feels small. Because he's an Imp.

name: Blowgun Imp
abilities: {{Deadly}}Deadly {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough Zombie Evolution: Bounce a Plant.
flavour: Much more successful than his cousin, the Inhalegun Imp.

name: Buried Treasure
abilities: Fusion: Conjure a {{Legendary:r:l is:zombie}} card, and it costs {{1Brain}} less.
flavour: Neptuna knew only one way to motivate an army of invading zombie pirates. Tell them about the secret treasure.

name: Toxic Waste Imp
abilities: Amphibious All {{Imps:include:token t:imp (type:f or Cakesplosion)}} are {{Deadly}}Deadly.
flavour: All the radioactive glow... none of the super powers.

name: Line Dancing Zombie
abilities: Gravestone {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough When revealed: Move this Zombie.
flavour: In her opinion, there's no better song to line dance to than the "Zombie Shuffle."

name: Pogo Bouncer
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Bounce a Plant.
flavour: Not the most efficient mode of transportation, but definitely the most fun.

name: Tomb Raiser Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When this hurts the Plant Hero, make a random {{Gravestone:a:gravestone type:f is:zombie -"Headstone Carver" - "Grave Robber" -"Mixed-Up Gravedigger"}} in a random lane.
flavour: He's good at making friends.

name: Ducky Tube Zombie
abilities: Amphibious This gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} when it hurts the Plant Hero.
flavour: Zombie Ducky, joy of joys. When it squeezes, you make noise!

name: Dr. Spacetime
abilities: Cards you Conjure cost {{1Brain}} less. When this hurts the Plant Hero, Conjure a {{Galactic Gardens:is:zombie set:g}} card.
flavour: He insists it's more than a screwdriver. Much more.

name: Laser Base Alpha
abilities: Zombies here get {{Deadly}}Deadly and {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough.
flavour: Zombies with LASERS. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Cursed Gargolith
abilities: Gravestone When Revealed: Steal 2 sections from the Plant Hero's Super-Block Meter. End of Turn: All {{Gargantuars:t:gargantuar type:f}} hide in Gravestones.
flavour: The lost temples of Hollow Earth were mysterious and inviting. Until they started to move.

name: Excavator Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Bounce an Environment and all Plants there.
flavour: He loved finding dinosaur fossils, until the dinosaurs started finding him.

name: Unthawed Viking
abilities: Amphibious When played: {{Frozen}}Freeze all Plants here. Pirate Evolution: Instead, this gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}} and {{Frozen}}Freeze all Plants in all lanes.
flavour: What's the best way to cross the ocean? Freeze it first. How hard could it be?

name: Mixed-Up Gravedigger
abilities: When played: Each Zombie hides in a Gravestone. Mix them up randomly.
flavour: Digging graves is hard work, but seeing customers rise out of them makes it all worth it.

name: Zombot Sharktronic Sub
abilities: Amphibious When a Plant gets hurt, destroy it. When any Plant is destroyed, this gets {{+1Strength}}.
flavour: Ever dream of piloting a giant shark robot? Join Dr. Zomboss now!

name: Zombot Plank Walker
abilities: Amphibious, {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough When played: Make two other random {{Pirates:t:pirate type:f -"Zombot Plank Walker" include:token}} in random lanes.
flavour: Deploying Pirates here, there and everywhere.

name: Space Cowboy
abilities: Amphibious, {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough This Zombie moves to the right when it hurts the Plant Hero.
flavour: Only in the big wide sky will he find Serenity.

name: Cryo-Yeti
abilities: Gravestone This gets {{+2Strength}}/{{+2Health}} when a Plant or Zombie is frozen. When revealed: {{Frozen}}Freeze a Plant.
flavour: Freezing Plants in the far reaches of Space is not what he'd imagined he'd spend his life doing. But as the old Yeti saying goes, "When life hands you snow, you make snow cones."

name: Zombot Aerostatic Gondola
abilities: Amphibious When this hurts the Plant Hero, it moves to a random lane and leaves behind a random {{Zombie:is:zombie t:f}}.
flavour: These pirates hit hard, then escape at 3 miles per hour.

name: Raiding Raptor
abilities: Dino-Roar: This gets {{+2Strength}}. When this hurts the Plant Hero, Conjure a {{card:is:zombie c<=2}} that costs {{2Brain}} or less.
flavour: Amazomb helmets mostly protect their ears from all the roaring.

name: Imposter
abilities: When destroyed: Conjure a {{1Brain}}-cost {{Imp:t:imp c:1 include:token}}. It gains a Mustache.
flavour: It's IMPossible to tell who he really is.

name: Fire Rooster
abilities: This moves to a random lane when a Plant is played here. When this enters a lane: Do 1 damage to all Plants here.
flavour: According to the Chinese Zodiac, it's the year of the Fire Rooster. Crispy fried Plants for all your Zombies!

name: Imp-Throwing Imp
abilities: When hurt: Make a random {{Imp:t:imp type:f c<=2 include:token}} that costs {{2Brain}} or less in a random lane.
flavour: But where is the Imp-Throwing-Imp-Throwing-Imp?? We have to go deeper...

name: Captain Flameface
abilities: All {{Pirates:t:pirate type:f include:token}} have {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough.
flavour: You get your beard caught in the toaster ONE time, and it's all anyone can talk about...

name: Zombie High Diver
abilities: Gravestone When revealed on Heights: This moves to the Water and gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}
flavour: He used to be afraid of heights... and water. True story.

name: Trapper Zombie
abilities: Gravestone When revealed: Make a {{Trapper Territory:Trapper Territory include:token}}.
flavour: Purveyor of only the finest banana peel coats.

name: Impfinity Clone
abilities: Amphibious
flavour: An IMPerfect copy, but it'll do.

name: Octo-Pet
abilities: Amphibious {{Frenzy}}Frenzy
flavour: It's slimy, beady-eyed, and it leaves ink splotches wherever it goes. Neptuna loves it all the same.

name: Dolphinado
abilities: Bounce a random Plant.
flavour: Weather report calls for afternoon tornados with a 75% chance of sea mammals.

name: In-Crypted
abilities: A Zombie hides in a Gravestone. Draw a card.
flavour: Requires eight characters, one upper case, a number, and the letter Z.

name: Super Stench
abilities: All Zombies get {{Deadly}}Deadly. Draw a card.
flavour: That's the smell of victory!

name: Ice Moon
abilities: Zombies here get {{Strikethrough}}Strikethrough. When played: {{Frozen}}Freeze all Plants here.
flavour: Be sure to pack a warm sweater.

name: Zombie
flavour: Owns a closet full of brown coats. And one plaid coat.

name: Returned Octo Zombie
abilities: Amphibious {{Frenzy}}Frenzy

name: Flick-a-Plant
abilities: Do 1 damage.
flavour: Annoying AND effective!

name: Get Well
abilities: Heal 2.
flavour: Helps with the boo-boos.

name: Motivate
abilities: A Zombie gets {{+1Strength}}/{{+1Health}}.
flavour: Ask not what the Zombies can do for you. Ask what you can do for the Zombies!
